dlf_summary_T002: DLF has one holding company, Rajdhani Investments & Agencies Private Limited, which holds 61.53% of shares and follows the company's policies on Code of Conduct, Corporate Governance, and principles of BRSR.

DLF has numerous subsidiaries, including DLF Aspinwal Hotels Private Limited, DLF Cochin Hotels Private Limited, DLF Property Developers Limited, DLF Home Developers Limited, DLF Homes Goa Private Limited, DLF Info Park (Pune) Limited, DLF Luxury Homes Limited, DLF Projects Limited, DLF Recreational Foundation Limited, DLF Residential Partners Limited, DLF Southern Towns Private Limited, DLF Universal Limited, DLF Utilities Limited, Domus Real Estate Private Limited, Edward Keventer (Successors) Private Limited, Galleria Property Management Services Private Limited, Isabel Builders & Developers Private Limited, Lodhi Property Company Limited, and many more.
DLF Recreational Foundation Limited and DLF Office Developers Private Limited have 85% shareholding by DLF.
Kolkata International Convention Centre Limited and DLF Homes Panchkula Private Limited have 99.90% and 99.94% shareholding by DLF respectively.
Most subsidiaries have 100% shareholding by DLF.
The document reviewed is the DLF Annual Report 2022-23 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report (BRSR).
globals_schema.formatted_dlf_summary_T003:
DLF Holding Company and Subsidiary Analysis - 2022-23 BRSR

Executive Summary

This report provides a detailed overview of DLF's holding company and its extensive network of subsidiaries, based on the information disclosed in the 2022-23 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report (BRSR). The analysis focuses on ownership structure and adherence to corporate governance policies.

1. Holding Company Structure

DLF's primary holding company is Rajdhani Investments & Agencies Private Limited. This entity holds a significant majority of DLF's shares.

Company Name Type Percentage of Shares Held by DLF Adherence to DLF Policies
Rajdhani Investments & Agencies Private Limited Holding Company 61.53% Yes (Code of Conduct, Corporate Governance, BRSR)

2. Subsidiary Network

DLF operates through a vast network of subsidiaries spanning various sectors within real estate and related industries. A significant portion of these subsidiaries are wholly owned by DLF.

2.1. Key Subsidiaries (100% Ownership)

The following subsidiaries are fully owned by DLF:

  • DLF Aspinwal Hotels Private Limited
  • DLF Cochin Hotels Private Limited
  • DLF Property Developers Limited
  • DLF Home Developers Limited
  • DLF Homes Goa Private Limited
  • DLF Info Park (Pune) Limited
  • DLF Luxury Homes Limited
  • DLF Projects Limited
  • DLF Residential Partners Limited
  • DLF Southern Towns Private Limited
  • DLF Universal Limited
  • DLF Utilities Limited
  • Domus Real Estate Private Limited
  • Edward Keventer (Successors) Private Limited
  • Galleria Property Management Services Private Limited
  • Isabel Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Lodhi Property Company Limited
  • Shivaji Marg Maintenance Services Limited
  • DLF Info City Hyderabad Limited
  • Ananti Builders & Construction Private Limited
  • Atherol Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Blanca Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Cadence Builders & Constructions Private Limited
  • Damalis Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Demarco Developers and Constructions Private Limited
  • Garv Developers Private Limited
  • Karida Real Estates Private Limited
  • Kokolath Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Milda Buildwell Private Limited
  • Mohak Real Estate Private Limited
  • Mufallah Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Naja Estates Developers Private Limited
  • Nadish Real Estate Private Limited
  • Raeks Estates Developers Private Limited
  • Skyrise Home Developers Private Limited
  • Talvi Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Uncial Builders & Constructions Private Limited
  • Verano Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Zima Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Cyrano Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Hathor Realtors Private Limited
  • Hesper Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Ken Buildcon Private Limited
  • Baal Realtors Private Limited
  • Gaynor Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Hurley Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Muriel Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Rujula Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Senymour Builders & Constructions Private Limited
  • Adana Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Ati Sunder Estates Developers Private Limited
  • Ethan Estates Developers Private Limited
  • First India Estates and Services Private Limited
  • Musetta Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Niabi Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Pegeen Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Sugreeva Builders & Developers Private Limited
  • Tatharaj Estates Private Limited
  • Zebina Real Estates Private Limited

2.2. Subsidiaries with Partial Ownership

DLF also holds significant stakes in the following subsidiaries:

Company Name Percentage of Shares Held by DLF
DLF Recreational Foundation Limited 85.00%
DLF Office Developers Private Limited 85.00%
Kolkata International Convention Centre Limited 99.90%
DLF Homes Panchkula Private Limited 99.94%

3. Governance and Compliance

The BRSR indicates that DLF's Code of Conduct, Corporate Governance policies, and BRSR principles are consistently applied across the company and its subsidiaries, ensuring a unified approach to ethical and sustainable business practices.

4. Conclusion

DLF's organizational structure is characterized by a strong holding company and a comprehensive network of subsidiaries. The high percentage of ownership in many subsidiaries allows for centralized control and consistent application of corporate policies.

output.fallback_markdown:
## DLF Subsidiary and Holding Company Analysis

This report summarizes the holding company and subsidiary structure of DLF based on the 2022-23 Business Responsibility and Sustainability Report (BRSR).

**Key Findings:**

*   **Holding Company:** Rajdhani Investments & Agencies Private Limited holds 61.53% of DLF shares and adheres to DLF's policies.
*   **Subsidiaries:** DLF has a large number of subsidiaries, many with 100% shareholding. Examples include DLF Aspinwal Hotels Private Limited, DLF Cochin Hotels Private Limited, and DLF Property Developers Limited.
*   **Partial Ownership:** DLF Recreational Foundation Limited and DLF Office Developers Private Limited have 85% DLF shareholding. Kolkata International Convention Centre Limited and DLF Homes Panchkula Private Limited have 99.90% and 99.94% shareholding respectively.

2.2. Subsidiaries with Partial Ownership

DLF also holds significant stakes in the following subsidiaries:

Company Name Percentage of Shares Held by DLF

3. Governance and Compliance

The BRSR indicates that DLF's Code of Conduct, Corporate Governance policies, and BRSR principles are consistently applied across the company and its subsidiaries, ensuring a unified approach to ethical and sustainable business practices.

4. Conclusion

DLF's organizational structure is characterized by a strong holding company and a comprehensive network of subsidiaries. The high percentage of ownership in many subsidiaries allows for centralized control and consistent application of corporate policies.
